title: Alphabet to bring Gemini AI to TV sets running on Google operating system - Business Standard
summary:
Alphabet to Bring Gemini AI to TV Sets Running on Google Operating System

Publication Date: Jan 06 2025 | Source: Bloomberg

Alphabet Inc. is set to enhance third-party TV sets running on Google’s operating system with the Gemini AI upgrade, allowing more natural voice interactions.

  • The Gemini upgrade will enable users to hold back-and-forth conversations with their TVs without needing to say “Hey Google” for each command.
  • This marks the first introduction of Gemini to third-party TVs from manufacturers like Sony, Hisense, and TCL.
  • The upgraded software also features improved content search and integration with YouTube.
  • A new “always-on” mode will show information based on user proximity to the TV, with TCL being the first to implement it in late 2025.
“The Gemini upgrade will allow users to hold back-and-forth conversations with third-party TVs without the need to use the ‘Hey Google’ trigger phrase for each command.”

This upgrade signifies a substantial advancement in user interaction with Google TV, enhancing convenience and functionality.
newTitle: Alphabet to Introduce Gemini AI to Google TV Sets

title: Hisense’s TriChroma TV could be the middle ground between Mini LED and MicroLED - The Verge
summary:
Hisense’s TriChroma TV could be the middle ground between Mini LED and MicroLED

Publication Date: January 2024 | Source: Hisense Press Release

Hisense showcases its new large-scale TVs at CES, featuring the 136-inch MicroLED and the 116-inch TriChroma LED TV, aiming to enhance home theater experiences.

  • The 136-inch MicroLED 136MX is touted as a consumer-ready MicroLED display but remains high-end and expensive.
  • Hisense claims the 136MX represents a significant step towards making cutting-edge display technology more accessible.
  • The TV uses over 24.88 million microscopic LEDs for exceptional brightness and quality without the risk of burn-in.
  • The new TriChroma LED TV utilizes RGB Local Dimming Technology to achieve a vibrant color spectrum and high brightness levels.
  • The TriChroma is reported to cover 97% of the BT.2020 color space, making it superior in color vibrance among Mini LED displays.
  • No pricing or release date information is available yet for the TriChroma TV.

The 136MX builds on Hisense’s legacy of display innovation, leveraging a high-density array of over 24.88 million microscopic LEDs to deliver unparalleled brightness, resolution, and precision.

Both TVs aim to redefine viewing experiences, but they remain high-end options for most consumers.
newTitle: Hisense’s TriChroma TV: The New Frontier Between Mini LED and MicroLED

title: CES 2025 | Intel unveils next-gen Core Ultra processors - CNBCTV18
summary:
Intel Unveils Next-Gen Core Ultra Processors at CES 2025

Publication Date: January 2025
Source: CNBC TV18

At the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2025, Intel introduced its latest Intel Core Ultra (Series 2) processors designed for businesses, creators, and gamers, featuring advanced AI capabilities and enhanced efficiency.

  • Intel Core Ultra (Series 2) processors showcased at CES 2025.
  • New processors feature over 400 AI capabilities for improved productivity.
  • Products aimed at businesses include Core Ultra 200V series equipped with Intel vPro technology.
  • Collaboration with Microsoft for AI-driven solutions in Copilot+ PCs.
  • Mobile processors for creators and gamers (200HX and H series) focus on performance while reducing power consumption.
  • Core Ultra 200U series balances performance, power efficiency, and affordability.
“Intel Core Ultra processors are redefining mobile AI and graphics, once again showcasing the superior performance and efficiency of the x86 architecture.” - Michelle Johnston Holthaus, Intel CEO

The introduction of these processors marks a significant advancement in personal computing, aiming to meet the demands of various user segments through innovative technology.
newTitle: Intel Unveils Next-Gen Core Ultra Processors at CES 2025

title: CES 2025: This smart mirror can show multiple health data by reading faces - The Times of India
summary:
CES 2025: This Smart Mirror Can Show Multiple Health Data by Reading Faces

Publication Date: January 6, 2025

Source: Times of India

This article discusses how a new smart mirror showcased at CES 2025 can analyze various health data simply by reading the facial features of users.

  • The mirror uses facial recognition technology to gather health metrics.
  • It provides personal insights tailored to each user.
  • Potential applications include monitoring vital signs and suggesting lifestyle changes.
“This could revolutionize how we monitor our health at home,” said a leading tech expert.

In conclusion, the smart mirror introduced at CES 2025 represents a significant advancement in personal health technology, offering users a unique way to engage with their health data.
newTitle: CES 2025: This Smart Mirror Can Show Multiple Health Data by Reading Faces

title: Google Wants Your TV to Know When You're In the Room - CNET
summary:
Google Wants Your TV to Know When You're In the Room

Publication Date: January 6, 2025
Source: CNET

Google has unveiled a new ambient mode for Google TV devices that allows them to detect when a person enters a room and display relevant information like news and weather without any input from the user.

  • The new feature was demonstrated at CES 2025.
  • The TVs will use radar-like technology to sense motion instead of cameras, prioritizing privacy and cost.
  • Existing presence detection features offered by competitors like Amazon and Sony are noted.
  • Google aims to make its TVs more of a living room hub, enhanced by AI upgrades with Gemini models.
"Our vision is that this can be something so much more," - Jamieson Brettle, Google product manager.

The upcoming Google TV products that support this feature are expected to launch later this year.
newTitle: Google Introduces Ambient Mode for TVs at CES 2025

title: EA SPORTS FC™ 25 TOTY - Vote Men's Team Of The Year - Electronic Arts Home Page
OnePlus 13 series launch: Where and when to watch the livestream. Check expected price, features - The Economic Times
summary:
OnePlus 13 series launch: Where and when to watch the livestream. Check expected price, features

Publication Date: January 7, 2025
Source: OnePlus Press Release

The much-anticipated launch of the OnePlus 13 series will take place during the Winter Launch Event, showcasing advanced features and specifications.

Where and When to Watch the Livestream

The event will be live-streamed on OnePlus India’s official YouTube channel, website, and social media channels.

OnePlus 13: What to Expect?

  • 6.82-inch BOE X2 2K+ AMOLED display with 4,500 nits peak brightness and 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset with up to 24GB of LPDDR5X RAM.
  • Features a Hasselblad-powered triple-camera system with three 50MP sensors.
  • 6,000mAh battery with 100W fast charging capabilities.
  • Available in three colors: Midnight Ocean, Arctic Dawn, and Black Eclipse.
  • IP68 and IP69 water and dust resistance ratings.

OnePlus 13R: The Affordable Flagship

Also launching is the OnePlus 13R, offering high-end features at a competitive price point. It will feature a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor and up to 16GB of RAM.

OnePlus Buds Pro 3

The event will unveil the Sapphire Blue variant of OnePlus Buds Pro 3, featuring AI Translation capabilities.

Accessories and Pricing Expectations

The OnePlus 13 is expected to be priced between Rs 67,000 and Rs 70,000, with the OnePlus 13R under Rs 40,000.

Mark your calendars for January 7, 2025, to witness OnePlus's latest innovations.
newTitle: OnePlus 13 series launch: Where and when to watch the livestream. Check expected price, features

title: Realme 14 Pro, Realme 14 Pro+ Official India Launch Date Confirmed; Could Debut With Colour-Changing Technology – Check Expected Specs and Price - Zee News
summary:
Realme 14 Pro, Realme 14 Pro+ Official India Launch Date Confirmed; Could Debut With Colour-Changing Technology – Check Expected Specs and Price

Date & Source: January 16, 2024, Zee News

The Chinese smartphone manufacturer Realme has confirmed the launch date of the Realme 14 Pro series in India. The series includes the Realme 14 Pro and Realme 14 Pro+ smartphones that will be available on Flipkart and the Realme website.

The Realme 14 Pro series is set to feature significant advancements, including:

  • Launch Date: January 16 at 12 PM IST
  • Powered by Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 processor
  • Available in four color variants: Pearl White, Suede Grey, Bikaner Purple, and Jaipur Pink
  • Pearl White variant features color-changing technology when immersed in water below 16 degrees Celsius
  • Expected prices: Rs 26,999 for Realme 14 Pro and Rs 32,999 for the Pro+ model
  • Realme 14 Pro+ to feature advanced camera system with 50MP periscope lens
  • Both models expected to have a massive 6,000mAh battery with IP68 rating
“The new smartphones are likely to offer the world's first triple flash with the cameras.”

Overall, the Realme 14 Pro series promises to bring cutting-edge specifications and innovative features to the Indian smartphone market.
newTitle: Realme 14 Pro and Pro+ Launch Date Announced in India

title: Nvidia RTX 5080 boxes from Gainward leaked hours ahead of CES 2025 - Sportskeeda
summary:
Nvidia RTX 5080 Boxes Leak Ahead of CES 2025

Date: January 6, 2024
Source: Sportskeeda

The Nvidia RTX 5080 is set for release at CES 2025, with significant leaks emerging just hours before the event. Credible X user Алексей (@wxnod) shared images of retail boxes, building anticipation among gamers.

  • Leaked boxes indicate the Gainward RTX 5080 will feature 16GB of GDDR7 memory.
  • The box mentions a standard three-year warranty.
  • Previous leaks, including a blurry MSI RTX 5080 box, have surfaced previously.
  • Key specifications of the RTX 5080 were outlined, including:
    • Architecture: Blackwell
    • CUDA cores: 84
    • Shader cores: 10,752
    • RT cores: 84
    • Memory capacity: 16GB
    • Memory bus width: 256-bit
    • Total memory bandwidth: 1024 GB/s
    • Thermal design power: 360W
  • More details are anticipated during the official CES announcement.
Note: This article is based on leaks that are subject to change.

As CES 2025 approaches, excitement grows surrounding the potential features and specifications of the RTX 5080 graphics card, which could redefine gaming experiences.
newTitle: Nvidia RTX 5080 Boxes Leak Ahead of CES 2025

  • Reno 13 5G starting at ₹37,999 for the 8GB + 128GB variant.

  • Reno 13 Pro 5G expected starting price of ₹49,999 for the 12GB + 256GB version and ₹54,999 for the 512GB model.

Bird Buddy Expands into Insect Technology with Wonder Line

Bird Buddy’s smart bird feeders have merged various consumer technologies to enhance wildlife interaction. At CES 2025, they announced their new Wonder line focused on pollinators.

  • The Wonder line includes two products: Petal and Wonder Blocks.
  • Petal functions like a trail camera for insects and integrates AI to live stream wildlife to devices.
  • Blocks is a modular ecosystem for creating biodiverse natural settings.
  • The line emphasizes innovative design, including solar-powered elements.
“Petal seamlessly merges cutting-edge engineering and technology to snap and live stream wildlife direct to your smartphone or smart device of choice.”

title: Realme Neo7 is headed to international markets - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
ULTRALOQ Unveils Innovative Smart Locks at CES 2025: Bolt Mission UWB + NFC And Bolt Fingerprint Matter - Ubergizmo
summary:
ULTRALOQ Unveils Innovative Smart Locks at CES 2025: Bolt Mission UWB + NFC And Bolt Fingerprint Matter

Date: January 2025

Source: Ubergizmo

ULTRALOQ introduces two cutting-edge smart locks at CES 2025, enhancing home security through innovative technology and smart home integration.

  • The ULTRALOQ Bolt Mission UWB + NFC is the first smart lock with ultra-wideband technology, offering precise location detection for automatic unlocking.
  • This lock supports NFC for easy access and integrates with smart home systems via Matter, compatible with various voice assistants.
  • The Bolt Fingerprint Matter allows multiple access methods, including app control, fingerprint recognition, and voice commands, with the ability to share digital keys.
  • Both locks boast weather-resistant designs and long battery life, with the Bolt Mission priced at $399 and the Bolt Fingerprint at $199.
“By pioneering technologies like UWB and integrating with Matter, ULTRALOQ reaffirms its leadership in the smart home industry.”

These new smart locks embody ULTRALOQ's commitment to convenience and security, making modern home living more accessible and efficient.
newTitle: ULTRALOQ Unveils Innovative Smart Locks at CES 2025: Bolt Mission UWB + NFC And Bolt Fingerprint Matter

Intel has announced the Arrow Lake family of CPUs at CES, highlighting the new Core Ultra 200HX series designed for gaming laptops.

  • The 200HX series CPUs offer up to 5% better single-thread and 20% better multi-thread performance compared to previous models.
  • Targeting gaming laptops, the flagship Intel Core Ultra 9 285HX features 24 cores and boosts up to 5.5GHz.
  • New laptops with advanced Nvidia GPUs are expected to launch in late Q1.

title: The Garmin Instinct 3 just launched at CES and it’s a rugged and affordable rival to the Fenix 8 - Tom's Guide
summary:
Garmin Launches Instinct 3: Affordable Rival to Fenix 8

Publication Date: CES 2025

Source: Tom's Guide

The Garmin Instinct 3 smartwatch range has been launched at CES 2025, introducing features like an AMOLED display, solar charging, and a rugged design aimed at being a more affordable option compared to the Fenix 8.

  • Instinct 3 features an AMOLED display for the first time.
  • Includes new solar-charging model for unlimited battery life in sunlight.
  • Affordably priced Instinct E starts at $299, with other models at $399 and $449.
  • Equipped with a built-in flashlight and rugged designs available in Neotropic and Electric Lime.
  • Tested to military standard for durability and water resistance up to 10 ATM.
  • Dual-band GPS for enhanced outdoor tracking accuracy.
  • All models include health monitoring and smart features such as NFC payments.
"The Instinct 3 is likely to draw some customers away from the flagship Fenix 8, which is much more expensive."

This launch reflects Garmin's commitment to providing robust smartwatches that meet various consumer needs at competitive price points.

Galaxy S24 One UI 7 beta update 3: Here’s the full changelog! - SamMobile - Samsung news
summary:
Galaxy S24 One UI 7 Beta Update 3: Here's the Full Changelog!

Published on: January 6, 2025

Source: SamMobile

Introduction

Samsung has kicked off the new year by releasing the third beta update for One UI 7 on the Galaxy S24 series during CES 2025 in Las Vegas. This update includes various fixes and improvements.

Full Changelog for One UI 7 Beta Update 3

  • Improves vertical scroll inconvenience in app drawer alignment
  • Game booster: Change screen playback default setting
  • Game booster: Change FPS setting name and max value
  • Game Booster: Default scanning rate 120Hz setting
  • Samsung Message: Modify Exception when saving MMS image
  • Improved quick panel closing operation
  • Modify that the Nowbar is not displayed on a specific path
  • Fix lock screen/AOD/status bar battery icon, notification icon alignment error
  • Fix errors related to lock screen editing
  • Fix the lock screen shortcut icon disappearing
  • Fix volume key operation error when using Routine+
  • Edge panel: Tools not displayed modified
  • Many other improvements

Conclusion

As the anticipation builds, it remains to be seen if this will be the final beta before the stable update launches, expected in February alongside the Galaxy S25 series.
newTitle: Galaxy S24 One UI 7 Beta Update 3: Full Changelog Released

title: Redmi 14C 5G arrives with a bigger 6.88" display, more efficient Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chip - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
One UI 7 Beta 3 update rolling out to Samsung Galaxy S24 series - Sammy Fans
summary:
One UI 7 Beta 3 Update Now Available for Samsung Galaxy S24 Series

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Sammy Fans

Samsung has commenced the rollout of the Android 15-based One UI 7 Beta 3 update for its Galaxy S24 series, with the update currently available in Germany and plans for broader distribution to follow.

  • The update is identified by the following build versions:
    • S921BXXU4ZXLJ – Galaxy S24
    • S926BXXU4ZXLJ – Galaxy S24 Plus
    • S928BXXU4ZXLJ – Galaxy S24 Ultra
  • It includes several bug fixes and improvements, enhancing the overall user experience.
  • The update adds the latest January 2025 security patch for better security and stability.
  • Improvements include smoother vertical scrolling in the app drawer and fixes for MMS image saving issues in the Samsung Messages app.
  • Changes to the Game Booster include new default screen playback settings and a maximum FPS adjustment for better gaming performance.
  • Nowbar placement issues and alignment problems with various icons on the lock screen are also addressed in this update.
newTitle: One UI 7 Beta 3 Update Now Available for Samsung Galaxy S24 Series
